Example of Tabs with Manual Activation

The below example section demonstrates a tabs widget that implements the tabs design pattern. In this example, a new panel is displayed only after the user activates a tab with either Space, Enter, or a mouse click. Typically, manual activation of tabs is only necessary when panels cannot be displayed instantly, i.e., not all the panel content is present in the DOM.
